title: Extra-large closets, Recycling, Close to Freeway
posting_body: Because we all see and consider things from many perspectives, allow Vida to present a choice selection of modern, urban apartment homes intended to satisfy a vision for an exceptional Seattle lifestyle.

Vida’s spacious floor plans are designed for practical convenience and stylish living, perfectly located in a superb, desirable Roosevelt neighborhood location, with convenient access to all that Seattle has to offer.
Vida respects the personal journey that brought you here and the ongoing process that will define your next steps.
In the meantime, come on over, stay a while, enjoy the ride.
Productivity reigns with multi-purpose conference rooms, privacy pods and open workstations
Gather in our resident lounge with a wall of tvs, shuffleboard, full kitchen & group dining
Air conditioning or air conditioning ports
Stand-alone kitchen bar/counter with designer pendant lighting
For more information, visit us at: <URL>
*Pricing, availability, and specials are subject to change without notice.
Photos may not be of the exact advertised unit.
Please contact us today for the most up to date information!
